org.matrix.androidsdk

Class MXSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.androidsdk.MXSession

  • public class MXSession
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents one user's session with a particular home server. There can potentially be multiple sessions for handling multiple accounts.

                       java.lang.String topic,

      • createRoom

        public void createRoom(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String topic,
                       java.lang.String visibility,
                       java.lang.String alias,
                       java.lang.String guestAccess,
                       java.lang.String historyVisibility,
                       java.lang.String algorithm,
                       ApiCallback<java.lang.String> callback)
        Create a new room with given properties. Needs the data handler.
        Parameters:
        name - the room name
        topic - the room topic
        visibility - the room visibility
        alias - the room alias
        guestAccess - the guest access rule (see RoomState.GUEST_ACCESS_CAN_JOIN or RoomState.GUEST_ACCESS_FORBIDDEN)
        historyVisibility - the history visibility
        algorithm - the crypto algorithm (null to create an unencrypted room)
        callback - the async callback once the room is ready

      • createEncryptedRoom

        public void createEncryptedRoom(java.lang.String algorithm,
                                ApiCallback<java.lang.String> callback)
        Create an encrypted room.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the encryption algorithm.
        callback - the async callback once the room is ready

      • createDirectMessageRoom

        public boolean createDirectMessageRoom(java.lang.String aParticipantUserId,
                                       ApiCallback<java.lang.String> aCreateRoomCallBack)
        Create a direct message room with one participant.
        The participant can be a user ID or mail address. Once the room is created, on success, the room is set as a "direct message" with the participant.
        Parameters:
        aParticipantUserId - user ID (or user mail) to be invited in the direct message room
        aCreateRoomCallBack - async call back response
        Returns:
        true if the invite was performed, false otherwise

      • createDirectMessageRoom

        public boolean createDirectMessageRoom(java.lang.String aParticipantUserId,
                                       java.lang.String algorithm,
                                       ApiCallback<java.lang.String> aCreateRoomCallBack)
        Create a direct message room with one participant.
        The participant can be a user ID or mail address. Once the room is created, on success, the room is set as a "direct message" with the participant.
        Parameters:
        aParticipantUserId - user ID (or user mail) to be invited in the direct message room
        algorithm - the crypto algorithm (null to create an unencrypted room)
        aCreateRoomCallBack - async call back response
        Returns:
        true if the invite was performed, false otherwise

      • createRoom

        public void createRoom(CreateRoomParams params,
                       ApiCallback<java.lang.String> callback)
        Create a new room with given properties.
        Parameters:
        params - the creation parameters.
        callback - the async callback once the room is ready

                     ApiCallback<java.lang.String> callback)
        Join a room by its roomAlias
        Parameters:
        roomIdOrAlias - the room alias
        callback - the async callback once the room is joined. The RoomId is provided.

      • searchMessageText

        public void searchMessageText(java.lang.String text,

                              int beforeLimit,
                              int afterLimit,
                              java.lang.String nextBatch,
                              ApiCallback<SearchResponse> callback)
        Perform a remote text search.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to search for.
        rooms - a list of rooms to search in. nil means all rooms the user is in.
        beforeLimit - the number of events to get before the matching results.
        afterLimit - the number of events to get after the matching results.
        nextBatch - the token to pass for doing pagination from a previous response.
        callback - the request callback

      • tagOrderToBeAtIndex

        public java.lang.Double tagOrderToBeAtIndex(int index,
                                            int originIndex,
                                            java.lang.String tag)
        Compute the tag order to use for a room tag so that the room will appear in the expected position in the list of rooms stamped with this tag.
        Parameters:
        index - the targeted index of the room in the list of rooms with the tag `tag`.
        originIndex - the origin index. Integer.MAX_VALUE if there is none.
        tag - the tag
        Returns:
        the tag order to apply to get the expected position.

      • getDirectChatRoomIdsList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDirectChatRoomIdsList(java.lang.String aSearchedUserId)
        Return the list of the direct chat room IDs for the user given in parameter.
        Based on the account_data map content, the entry associated with aSearchedUserId is returned.
        Parameters:
        aSearchedUserId - user ID
        Returns:
        the list of the direct chat room Id

      • toggleDirectChatRoom

        public void toggleDirectChatRoom(java.lang.String roomId,
                                 java.lang.String aParticipantUserId,
                                 ApiCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Toggles the direct chat status of a room.
        Create a new direct chat room in the account data section if the room does not exist, otherwise the room is removed from the account data section. Direct chat room user ID choice algorithm:
        1- oldest joined room member 2- oldest invited room member 3- the user himself
        Parameters:
        roomId - the room roomId
        aParticipantUserId - the participant user id
        callback - the asynchronous callback
